verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> not my <S%H8451>law;<s%> but let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments:<s%>
For <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H753>long<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> and <S%H7965>peace,<s%> shall they <S%H3254>add<s%> to you.

Let not <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> you: <S%H7194>bind<s%> them <S%H5921>about<s%> your <S%H1621>neck;<s%> <S%H3789>write<s%> them on the <S%H3871>table<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart:<s%>
So shall you <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H120>man.<s%>
<S%H982>Trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3820>heart;<s%> and <S%H8172>lean<s%> not to your own <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
In <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> him, and he shall <S%H3474>direct<s%> your <S%H734>paths.<s%>
Be not <S%H2450>wise<s%> in your own <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
It shall be <S%H7500>health<s%> to your <S%H8270>navel,<s%> and <S%H8250>marrow<s%> to your <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
<S%H3513>Honor<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with your <S%H1952>substance,<s%> and with the first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8393>increase:<s%>
So shall your <S%H618>barns<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7647>plenty,<s%> and your <S%H3342>presses<s%> shall <S%H6555>burst<s%> out with <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3988>despise<s%> not the <S%H4148>chastening<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be <S%H6973>weary<s%> of his <S%H8433>correction:<s%>
For <S%H853>whom<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> he <S%H3198>corrects;<s%> even as a <S%H1>father<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> in whom he <S%H7521>delights.<s%>
<S%H835>Happy<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H6329>gets<s%> <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
For the <S%H5504>merchandise<s%> of it is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H5505>merchandise<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H8393>gain<s%> thereof than fine <S%H2742>gold.<s%>
She is more <S%H3368>precious<s%> than <S%H6443>rubies:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the things you can <S%H2656>desire<s%> are not to be <S%H7737>compared<s%> to her.
<S%H753>Length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> is in her <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand;<s%> and in her <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honor.<s%>
Her <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H5278>pleasantness,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H5410>paths<s%> are <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
She is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> to them that lay <S%H2388>hold<s%> on her: and <S%H833>happy<s%> is every one that <S%H8551>retains<s%> her.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> has <S%H3245>founded<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> by <S%H8394>understanding<s%> has he <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
By his <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> the <S%H8415>depths<s%> are <S%H1234>broken<s%> up, and the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> <S%H7491>drop<s%> <S%H7491>down<s%> the <S%H2919>dew.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> let not them <S%H3868>depart<s%> from your <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> <S%H8454>sound<s%> <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4209>discretion:<s%>
So shall they be <S%H2416>life<s%> to your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H2580>grace<s%> to your <S%H1621>neck.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> shall you <S%H3212>walk<s%> in your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H983>safely,<s%> and your <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall not <S%H5062>stumble.<s%>

<S%H518>When<s%> you <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> you shall not be <S%H6342>afraid:<s%> yes, you shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> and your <S%H8142>sleep<s%> shall be <S%H6149>sweet.<s%>
Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H6597>sudden<s%> <S%H6343>fear,<s%> neither of the <S%H7722>desolation<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it <S%H935>comes.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be your <S%H3689>confidence,<s%> and shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> from being <S%H3921>taken.<s%>
<S%H4513>Withhold<s%> not <S%H2896>good<s%> from them to whom it is <S%H1167>due,<s%> when it is in the <S%H410>power<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it.

<S%H559>Say<s%> not to your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H3212>Go,<s%> and <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> I will <S%H5414>give;<s%> when you <S%H3426>have<s%> it by you.
<S%H2790>Devise<s%> not <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> seeing he <S%H3427>dwells<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%> by you.
<S%H7378>Strive<s%> not with a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> he have <S%H1580>done<s%> you <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7451>harm.<s%>
<S%H7065>Envy<s%> you not the <S%H376>oppressor,<s%> <S%H2555><s%> and <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H408>none<s%> of his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For the <S%H3868>fraudulent<s%> is <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> but his <S%H5475>secret<s%> is with the <S%H3477>righteous.<s%>
The <S%H3994>curse<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%> but he <S%H1288>blesses<s%> the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of the <S%H6662>just.<s%>
<S%H518>Surely<s%> he <S%H3887>scorns<s%> the <S%H3887>scorners:<s%> but he <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> to the <S%H6041>lowly.<s%>
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3519>glory:<s%> but <S%H7036>shame<s%> shall be the <S%H7311>promotion<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
